inputs.name: station
inputs.description: Weather station according to SIA 2028:2010 Klimadaten. Default is Zurich-Kloten

outputs.name: I-E
outputs.description: Monthly global irradiation, East facade, in [Wh/m2]

outputs.name: I-S
outputs.description: Monthly global irradiation, South facade, in [Wh/m2]

outputs.name: I-W
outputs.description: Monthly global irradiation, West facade, in [Wh/m2]

outputs.name: I-N
outputs.description: Monthly global irradiation, North facade, in [Wh/m2]

outputs.name: theta_e
outputs.description: Average monthly ambient air temperature - Aussenlufttemperatur, in [°C]
